channel.title: Navaja Negra on d3bo
channel.description: Recent content in Navaja Negra on d3bo

item.title: Anbu
item.description: #!/usr/bin/env python3 from pwn import * e = ELF("./Anbu_Fortress_patched") context.binary = e # Set the target binary for pwntools context.terminal = ["kitty", "-e"] # Terminal to use for GDB debugging HOST = "10.

item.title: Armeria
item.description: #!/usr/bin/env python3 from pwn import * e = ELF("./Armeria") context.binary = e # Set the target binary for pwntools context.terminal = ["kitty", "-e"] # Terminal to use for GDB debugging HOST = "challs.
